# Known Remote Codes
In the form that ESPHome expects. See https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter

## Fanimation Fan RF Remotes

### RH787T Remote

FCC ID: CHQRH787T

Frequency: 303.947 MHz

DIP Switch Configuration: UP, DOWN, DOWN, UP
